Kim Jong Il's work published in Venezuela
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's work published in Venezuela 
    Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "On preserving the Juche character and national character of the revolution and construction" was published in booklet by the Cantaclara Publishing House of Venezuela.
 Clarified in the work, which was made public on June 19, Juche 86 (1997), are the reason why preservation of the Juche character and national character of the revolution and construction serves as a fundamental principle to be maintained in accomplishing the cause of socialism, and tasks and ways to carry it out.
